title: Peer Assessment Competency Enhancement Program in Team-Based Learning Using Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment to enhance adult learners' social participation competencies

learning_goals: Learners can solve team project problems by applying the five stages of design thinking (empathize, define, ideate, prototype, test).
Learners can objectively evaluate peers’ responsibility, initiative, and collaboration skills on a 5-point scale during team activities.
Learners can improve individual and team performance competencies by reflecting on peer assessment results through a feedback routine.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
